Item ID1157

The steel full helm is the third weakest full helm in RuneScape. The steel full helm grants greater defensive bonuses than its medium helmet counterpart, though at a cost of offensive bonuses for Ranged and Magic. Wearing this helmet requires at least 5 Defence.

To create a steel full helmet you need at least 37 Smithing, a hammer, and two steel bars. Then use one of the bars on an anvil with the hammer in your inventory. This will grant 75 Smithing experience.

Members with 16+ Construction can use a steel full helmet on a pluming stand to make a steel heraldic helm, a steel full helm designed in the colours of the player's family crest. Family crests are obtained from Sir Renitee in Falador Castle.

[[File:Steel full helm detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:Steel full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''steel full helm''' is the third weakest [[full helm]] in ''[[RuneScape]]''. The steel full helm grants greater [[Defence|defensive]] bonuses than its [[Steel medium helmet|medium helmet]] counterpart, though at a cost of offensive bonuses for [[Ranged]] and [[Magic]]. Wearing this helmet requires at least 5 [[Defence]].

To create a steel full helmet you need at least 37 [[Smithing]], a [[hammer]], and two [[steel bar]]s. Then use one of the bars on an [[anvil]] with the hammer in your inventory. This will grant 75 Smithing experience.

Members with 16+ [[Construction]] can use a steel full helmet on a [[pluming stand]] to make a [[steel heraldic helm]], a steel full helm designed in the colours of the player's family crest. Family crests are obtained from [[Sir Renitee]] in [[Falador Castle]].
